q.quote: Progress is impossible without change, and those who cannot change their minds cannot change anything.
q.author: George Bernard Shaw

q.quote: Sorrow can be alleviated by good sleep, a bath and a glass of wine.
q.author: Thomas Aquinas

q.quote: Success is not a good teacher, failure makes you humble.
q.author: Shah Rukh Khan

q.quote: Science is not only a disciple of reason but, also, one of romance and passion.
q.author: Stephen Hawking

q.quote: The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams.
q.author: Oprah Winfrey

q.quote: The good times of today, are the sad thoughts of tomorrow.
q.author: Bob Marley

q.quote: Some people dream of success, while other people get up every morning and make it happen.
q.author: Wayne Huizenga

q.quote: Prayer does not change God, but it changes him who prays.
q.author: Soren Kierkegaard

q.quote: Where we love is home - home that our feet may leave, but not our hearts.
q.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

q.quote: Family is not an important thing. It's everything.
q.author: Michael J. Fox

q.quote: Your diet is a bank account. Good food choices are good investments.
q.author: Bethenny Frankel

q.quote: Love is my religion - I could die for it.
q.author: Bethenny Frankel

q.quote: You don't choose your family. They are God's gift to you, as you are to them.
q.author: Desmond Tutu

q.quote: Your diet is a bank account. Good food choices are good investments.
q.author: Bethenny Frankel

q.quote: You cannot push any one up a ladder unless he be willing to climb a little himself.
q.author: Andrew Carnegie
